issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://youtube.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fyoutube.com) ### Comment > When adguard protection is running in the background, opening YouTube in either firefox, edge or chrome will result in the screen being blocked by the mosaic, but as soon as adguard protection is turned off and refresh the page, the screen will return to normal. (No custom rules added, adguard maintains default settings) I tried uninstalling ublock but no improvement, but when ublock is the only one running it blocks YouTube ads properly. issue.title: Как сменить тему и убрать фон warhammer40k.fandom.com ?
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

3.6.11/54

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://warhammer40k.fandom.com/ru/wiki/%D0%9A%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%B3%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%B8%D1%8F:%D0%9F%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B5%D1%82%D1%8B

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Помогите сменить тему с тёмной на светлую и убрать фон на warhammer40k.fandom.com. Фон получается убрать только статичными фильтрами, но он там переодически по вики меняется, так что они что мёртвому припарка. От тёмной темы по дефолту кровь из глаз течёт (меняется в углу), хочется саетлую по дефолту мделать, дабы постоянно не переключать. Знаю, что через adguard можно подобное сделать, но опыта у меня для подобного маловато. Пробовал - не получилось.

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions.
